sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>district</radical> that <radical>lack</radical>s things will be in <kanji>Europe</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Picture a map of Europe in your mind. Now picture little words saying which district is lacking what. This one is lacking water. That one is lacking food.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Europe</kanji> is lacking so much because their <ja><reading>王</reading></ja> (<ja>おう</ja>) keeps taking everything.
readingInfo: Okay, so maybe this is an old view of Europe. But back in the old days the <ja>王</ja>s there would take everything from their subjects, so every district would lack something. Good thing things aren't that way now, huh?
